segments.text: I'd like a pair of sports shoes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we have all kinds of sports shoes.Could you tell me what kind of sport you usually do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , then you can buy a pair of jogging shoes.Here are jogging shoes.Which pair do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Er ... , that blue pair . I need size 43 , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are.You can try them on .
segments.speaker: S1
